text: Turkey has been participating at the Deaflympics since 1989 and has earned a total of 108 medals. ==Medal tallies== ===Summer Deaflympics=== Event Gold Silver Bronze Total 1989 0 0 2 2 1993 0 2 1 3 1997 1 4 3 8 2001 3 0 3 6 2005 2 5 3 10 2009 4 6 7 17 2013 7 9 19 35 2017 17 7 22 46 ===Winter Deaflympics=== Event Gold Silver Bronze Total 2007 0 0 1 1 ==Related pages== *Turkey at the Paralympics *Turkey at the Olympics ==References== ==Other websites== *Deaflympics official website *2017 Deaflympics Category:Deaflympics Deaflympics
title: Turkey at the Deaflympics
